channel.title: Enflux [718/745]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/XnK3swT.png[/img]
[size=14pt][font=arial black]
[url=http://Enflux.org]Enflux.org[/url]
New Features
Gravestones 100%!!! Alchemy (High/Low) SoulWars (Both Avatars) Custom minigames added God Minigame Singularity Minigame Cannons released Hati Danger Hall Minigame -Enchanting (all levels) -Party Demon -Clan Citadel -WildyWyrm -God following system -Organized home. (seriously) -ADDED MORE 745+ items like Drygore -100% Construction -More items to shops -FALLING STAR STRIKES HOME -15+ Bosses -Money Pouch 100% -Frost Dragons -Awesome XP Rate -Advanced Dung -Dominion Weps - Clue Scrolls/Rewards Same as RS - Achievements with Rewards(phat,primal, ect) - Fixed Sprites! (Squeal, No-null mapdata) - Disk of returning (world rare drop) - MO Shops - God Spells - Tut Island! - Vote4Rewards - PvM Credits/Shop - Pk Box - Fixed Squeal of Fortune - Artisian Workshop - Zombie Minigame - Fight Kiln - New or Old Item Looks, You Decide! (::Switchitemslook) - Makeover Mage - Brand New Shops - Nex 100% - Queen Black Dragon. COMPLETE 100% - New King Black Dragon Added - New Godwar Items Such as the Armadyl Buckler etc Have Been Added with Real Bonuses!
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qC5USvM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8YWThO9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fAge2Ex.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EN1udRp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RZy9nTZ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PIucHLh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MktkmdO.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/25106_37487.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C08nRoa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eAwN6Ur.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2hhMx2X.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yvwllbr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s9HDpG2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/25106_36677.png[/img]
[/center]
Minigames -Clue Scrolls - Zombies Minigame (Custom) - Dominion Tower - Fight Caves - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Kiln - Clan Wars - Castle Wars - Fight Pits
Bosses Bandos Armadyl Saradomin Zamorak King Black Dragon Tormented Demons Queen Black dragon Corporeal Beast Bork Mole Kalphite Queen Lucien Nex Custom Donator Boss with rare Rewards Dagannoth Rex Dagannoth Prime Dagannoth Supreme
Training 17 + Bosses to train on. Customised starter gear and combat levels for classes(Warrior, Mage, Archer, Skiller). Dominion Tower (with Dominion factor and rewards. Working slayer with rewards. Multiple Training Teleports. PvM Points, rewards for killing Monsters. Working LootShare.
Skilling Stable, customised XP rate. (Not easy, not very hard). Construction, Own a House, build inside it and chill with friends. Livid Farming + Fully working Original farming with Compost bin etc. New Animation options for Cooking, Mining, Smithing and Fletching. Custom Dungeoneering, 2 Levels done. Agility Tickets and rewards shop. NEW Alching (Low/high) NEW Enchanting NEW Cooking being worked on, water, flour, pies etc.
Pking Teleports
- Mage Bank - Revenants - Edgeville - Easts - Wests
Dungeons Polypore Kuradal Jadinko Lair Slayer Tower Glacors Dominion Tower
Extras Achievements - Earn Mystery Boxes with a chance to win rares. 745+ Items (Kalphite Armour + Drygore weapons) Crashing stars at home, collect stardust to purchase rewards. Auto-Donation System Auto-vote reward system. Highscores Switchitemslook (New/Old). Great Economy. Clan citadel portals and clan hall working. (total level of 1,500 Required until finished). Decanting. Money Pouch. Max Cape + Completionist Capes. Dicing + Flowering for Trusted users only. Loyalty points and rewards. Unique Home (soon to add ::sethome when player count rises). Custom Quest. Dwarf Multi-cannons. Custom Punishment system, warnings (BlackMarks) with automatic punishments such as jail/ban. Party Demon summoned to rock out the home. Now much more dialogue, more objects at home, skill flags etc.[/center][/font][/size]

item.title: Enflux [718/745]

ooooo i think i might try this out

item.title: Enflux [718/745]
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I think I may have to check this out. What is the xp rate and what is the resource gathering like? I am not a fan of loads of shops to gain levels.

Read full topic

item.title: Enflux [718/745]
item.dc:creator: @nick_alfrado nick alfrado
item.description:
@nick_alfrado wrote:

Dun kan:

Although I’m not a fan of 700+ servers, this does look rather appealing :).

Thanks! I feel 700+ servers can be great. Its all about what direction they take the server.

Read full topic

[center]

[size=14pt][font=arial black]

Enflux.org

New Features

-More items to shops

-Frost Dragons

  • Clue Scrolls/Rewards Same as RS
  • Achievements with Rewards(phat,primal, ect)
  • Fixed Sprites! (Squeal, No-null mapdata)
  • Disk of returning (world rare drop)
  • MO Shops
  • God Spells

  • Pk Box

  • New Godwar Items Such as the Armadyl Buckler etc Have Been Added with Real Bonuses!

Customised starter gear and combat levels for classes(Warrior, Mage, Archer, Skiller).
Dominion Tower (with Dominion factor and rewards.
Working slayer with rewards.
Multiple Training Teleports.
PvM Points, rewards for killing Monsters.
Working LootShare.

Skilling
Stable, customised XP rate. (Not easy, not very hard).
Construction, Own a House, build inside it and chill with friends.
Livid Farming + Fully working Original farming with Compost bin etc.
New Animation options for Cooking, Mining, Smithing and Fletching.
Custom Dungeoneering, 2 Levels done.
Agility Tickets and rewards shop.
NEW Alching (Low/high)

Crashing stars at home, collect stardust to purchase rewards.

Highscores
Switchitemslook (New/Old).
Great Economy.
Clan citadel portals and clan hall working. (total level of 1,500 Required until finished).
Decanting.
Money Pouch.
Max Cape + Completionist Capes.
Dicing + Flowering for Trusted users only.
Loyalty points and rewards.
Unique Home (soon to add ::sethome when player count rises).
Custom Quest.
Dwarf Multi-cannons.
Custom Punishment system, warnings (BlackMarks) with automatic punishments such as jail/ban.
Party Demon summoned to rock out the home.
Now much more dialogue, more objects at home, skill flags etc.[/center][/font][/size]
